story_teamaquamagma_02_12000/2401_1001_0:
So, the meteor has been destroyed, and Groudon
and Kyogre are calm again.

I understand that we were able to stop the
meteor by smashing it into pieces...

but why did Groudon and Kyogre also calm down
when we did that?

Well, when I was on the way back from
catching Deoxys...

Professor Bellis was with me and managed to
shut it down. That also stopped the super-ancient
Pokémon from losing control.

We discussed the matter and assume that the
device was amplifying natural energy.

That means someone must’ve caused all of
this intentionally...

What an awful thing to do! You shouldn’t force
Pokémon to go on a rampage!
story_teamaquamagma_02_12000/2401_1001_1:
In the name of the International Police, I refuse to
let whoever did this run free!
Do you know who caused this?

Yes, I do! During my investigation, we learned that
Team Rocket were the ones pulling the strings!

They made Team Magma and Team Aqua fight on
purpose—and used that chaos as a cover for their
evil deeds!

The suspicious device that Steven found must be
Team Rocket’s!

So, if that’s the case, what are we going to do
with Team Aqua and Team Magma?

They both caused damage to the island, but that
was only because they were being used by
someone else.
story_teamaquamagma_02_12000/2401_1001_2:
They’re not innocent, but we won’t be arresting
them for now.
Sorry, kid... I wasn’t directin’ that to you.
I deeply regret involving all of you in our mess...
Matt...don’t you have something to say?
I’m sorry. I caused a lot of trouble...
Courtney, come on. Apologize to everyone, too!
story_teamaquamagma_02_12000/2401_1001_3: You don’t have to be so hard on yourselves.

You’ve been punished enough and are sorry for
what you’ve done.

If anything...you’re probably upset that you’ve hurt
your own leaders...

That’s why we’re here with you now. But we
actually have something else to say to you...
This incident hit us hard with a valuable lesson.

In the face of the wonders of nature and a
worldwide catastrophe...

squabbling over the ocean and land just seems
so trivial.
So for now, let’s stop with this fighting.

Team Magma and Team Aqua have decided to
call a truce!
story_teamaquamagma_02_12000/2401_1001_4:
It might not be enough to atone for
my wrongdoings...

but perhaps we could offer our assistance the next
time Pasio needs to be protected.
Of course! Sounds good to me!

We’ve got a lot of reliable allies now.
Don’t we, Steven?

We can overcome conflict and work together, hand
in hand, in order to protect our future...

As long as we believe in the potential of people
and Pokémon!
